summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Cream is a moisture-rich cream that ups the hydration intensity of Clinique's best-selling face lotion.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Very Dry to Dry Combination (Skin Types 1, 2)Dermatologist-developed formula combines all-day protection with skin-strengthening ingredientsSoothes even the driest skinsMakes skin more resilientUse it daily to help keep skin looking younger, longerDermatologist testedNon-acnegenicAllergy testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesDenatured alcoholSLSSLESSulfatesFragranceItem 2290045How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night. Apply to face and throat all over, or where needed.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Petrolatum, Tridecyl Stearate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentastearate, Behenyl Alcohol, Dipentaerythrityl Hexacaprylate/Hexacaprate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract / Extrait D'Orge, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, PEG-100 Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Tromethamine, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Red 33 (CI 17200).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use twice a day, morning and night. Apply to face and throat all over, or where needed.

reviews.headline: Its ok
reviews.comments: It is just a basic moisturizer.  Nothing really special

reviews.headline: Super moisturizing
reviews.comments: Best moisturizer I have ever used!

reviews.headline: Great Moisturizer for Extremely Dry Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I absolutely love and need this rich moisture for my very dry skin. I can never be without it as my skin is so dry it flakes and peels without intense moisture on a daily basis! It doesn't cause oiliness or breakouts but if you didn't have extremely dry skin I imagine it could feel to heavy and hydrating.

reviews.headline: Smells off
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and although this used to break me out when my skin was oily (in my 20's), I thought I'd give it another try. I used to work for Clinique, and this definitely smells off. Almost like it's past it's shelf life. Also pills up on my face.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I have used this and will continue to.  My skin is very dry and this works very well

reviews.headline: My new favorite facial moisturizer ðŸ’œ
reviews.comments: I been dealing with servely dry skin for the past year that would be so flakey and irritated and I did damage my skin barrier by over exfoliating. Anyways I recently got this moisturizer to give it a shot since theres so many good reviews! When I tell you this moisturizer saved my skinâ€¦ it saved my skin. My dry flakey skin was gone in a matter of seconds, the irritation also gone! My skin has never felt this soft and looked this good for a long while. This product does go a long way so a couple small dots all across the face will do! I definitely would repurchase this product in the future once I run out. Truly the best!

reviews.headline: Wonderful!
reviews.comments: I'm glad I tried this. It is great for senior skin, hydrates well & feels good on.

reviews.headline: The best moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! I bought it to replace my Clinique moisturizer with SPF which is a bit greasy

reviews.headline: Read the ingredients!
reviews.comments: This contains Yellow 5, Yellow 6, Red 33. As well as barley which contains gluten. This is NOT an allergen friendly product.

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I have very dry skin and this product works for me . It's makes my face feel moisturized and helps my makeup slide on without lines .

reviews.headline: I cant live without this cream
reviews.comments: I am using this cream for around 5 years. In the morning and night after I shower. I get compliments of my skin very often. But most important my skin feels soft and not dry.

reviews.headline: This is a winter weather necessity!
reviews.comments: I was accustomed to using the Yellow Dramatically Different Moisturizing lotion, and have been using it for years.  However, I was looking for a thicker formula for the winter months. This cream is great. Thicker but not too thick.  It goes on smoothly and I like how my skin feels afterwards.

reviews.headline: Excema healer
reviews.comments: This is the best moisturizer i have ever tried. My skin is extremely dry with different textures and as the weather is changing my skin has not looked better.

reviews.headline: I Love This Cream!
reviews.comments: I love how how this cream melts into my skin.  My skin is very dry and this is soothing!

reviews.headline: Needs more oil
reviews.comments: I miss the old Dramatically Different. It was oil based which was too rich to use in my 20's. However I buy this for my relative who has mature skin and it's still not hydrating enough. It needs to be reformulated with oil as a base just like the original Clinique Dramatically Different. Then maybe the product might sell better.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for decades
reviews.comments: I first used this as Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion, and then as I aged and my skin got drier, in the Cream form. I love it.

reviews.headline: Great Moisturizer For Dry Skin
reviews.comments: My skin has become very dry in the past five years. Just got this a couple weeks ago and it is wonderful.  Use it every day and my skin is so soft.

reviews.headline: Causes zits
reviews.comments: I was loving this cream until I figured out that this was the culprit of my new acne problem. I also read other reviews that stated the same thing. I will definitely be discontinuing the product and returning it.

reviews.headline: Repeat buyer
reviews.comments: I am a repeat buyer. This product has a firming element I really like. Great to be told I look 15 years younger!

reviews.headline: Terrible skin reaction
reviews.comments: I was in shock this cream gave me a skin reaction, my face had a burning sensation and my eyes hurt too.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using the dramatically different moisturizing lotion for years and it is great but this is awesome for my skin I have severe eczema which get so dry that it breaks and splits open so the dramatically different moisturizing lotion was great but I did always have to layer the moisture start intense on top of it I think that I may be able to use this cream all alone. Awesome product.
faceoff_positive.headline: better than even ddml for intense dry skin

faceoff_negative.comments: I've used the dramatically different moisturizing lotion for years and recently switched to the cream. I've used it multiple times around the house, and it definitely felt like my face was hydrated all day. However, I recently used it under my foundation (Bare Minerals Bare Skin liquid foundation), and when I was using a brush to apply my foundation, the makeup started to flake off. I repeated the process with the dramatically different lotion, and there were no flakes. I have not tried the cream under other brands of foundation to see if the problem persists.
faceoff_negative.headline: Flakes under some foundations
